summary: Over the 6‑hour window winds were consistently strong (mean ≈14.25 m/s, std ≈0.86) with gusts up to 43.7 m/s, while generated power remained nearly constant at about 0.975 of rated with very low variability and only modest rotor speed fluctuation. Operational anomalies include an average blade pitch near 9° and yaw misalignment around 9.5°, a persistent negative power residual (~−0.096) indicating output below expected for the conditions, and elevated temperatures around 66.7°C, with no non‑normal status flags recorded.
